Body: Description: Hello. I have had help from the team to create a report that will provide us with permission groups for our servers. I am looking to try and better organize this report and understand the columns I can add. Thank you

I'd say offer a call. mention / potentially assist with view creation. Discuss reports.

Too much past that and we are headed to proserv territory.
Invitation updated. Attendees: No attendees listed
Invitation updated. Attendees: Joshua Sexton, Alex Parsa
Next Steps Updated: meeting to review report and how they would like to filter it

zoom meeting

 

report already in place

goes through the FS and report security groups and the paths

uses SA_FSAA_PrermissionsView

includes groups and users

wants to filter out users

 

modified filters and filtered for only domain users using TrusteeTypeDescription column

 

the report shows the folder path, but he would prefer the share path

 

may need to engage with ProServ

What We've Learned Updated: report already in place

goes through the FS and report security groups and the paths

uses SA_FSAA_PrermissionsView

includes groups and users

wants to filter out users

 

modified filters and filtered for only domain users using TrusteeTypeDescription column

 

the report shows the folder path, but he would prefer the share path

 

may need to engage with ProServ for this
-he doesn't really want to do that, so he's going to play around with SQL View Creation and try to join tables
Next Steps Updated: He's going to let me know how the report works for him now
